Pre-Game Insights: India have a 19-11 win-loss record in the T20I format against Australia.
Australia have a 21-run loss against Afghanistan in their previous match.
India have been unbeaten in the T20 World Cup 2024.
The pitches at the Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium in Gros Islet, St Lucia, have given the opportunity to the batters to score big runs.
Australia's bowling attack did enough earlier in their T20 World Cup 2024 match, with Pat Cummins taking a second consecutive hat-trick in the tournament.
India's bowling lineup was quite exceptional, with their spearhead Jasprit Bumrah picking up key wickets.
